entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
